subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Islanders gave up two prospects and this year’s first-round draft choice for left wing Ryan Smyth, who became the face of the Oilers during his 11-plus seasons in Edmonton.
snippet: The Islanders gave up two prospects and this year’s first-round draft choice for left wing Ryan Smyth, who became the face of the Oilers during his 11-plus seasons in Edmonton.
